nodes.text: Kerlay Utanks was a male individual who operated a kitchen appliance store in the planet of Fwillsving's capital city, Svitalos, in 22 BBY. That year, Fwillsving's limmie team triumphed over the planet of Kubindi's team with a single point in the opening round of the Galactic Cup of Limmie. This victory inspired a riot that ransacked Svitalos. One of the four million celebrants expressing their jubilation by looting, vandalizing, and partying in the streets, Utanks marked the occasion by detonating a number of thermal detonators in his own store. When asked for comment by a HoloNet News reporter, Utanks only reaffirmed his euphoric sensibilities.

Kerlay Utanks was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 47, that was published in-universe on the fourteenth day of the third month in 22 BBY. The article that referenced him, titled "Coruscant Eliminated in Galactic Cup Opening Round," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
